selection_reasoning: Selected top 2 performers (hexagonal+SLSQP and COBYLA) plus 3 diverse approaches (basin hopping, greedy+polish, simulated annealing). Best score is 2.5755 vs target 2.636 - gap of ~0.06. Next generation should focus on: (1) improving initialization quality, (2) more aggressive global search, (3) hybrid approaches combining best elements. Notable that 7/16 trials failed due to code errors - need cleaner prompts.

trial_selections.reasoning: Best score (2.5755) using hexagonal grid initialization + SLSQP. This is our current best and worth refining further.
Second best (2.5558) using COBYLA gradient-free optimizer. Different optimization method than SLSQP, worth exploring.
Basin hopping global optimization (2.5327). Different global search strategy that could escape local minima better with tuning.
Two-stage greedy + SLSQP polish (2.5316). The greedy initialization strategy is fundamentally different from grid-based approaches.
Simulated annealing (2.319). Lower score but metaheuristic approach has potential with better cooling schedule and more iterations.
